snippet: Game On Dude led all the way in winning the $500,000 Hollywood Gold Cup by a length, giving the trainer Bob Baffert his fifth victory in the race.
abstract: Thoroughbred race horse Game On Dude leads all the way in winning $500,000 Hollywood Gold Cup by a length, giving trainer Bob Baffert his fifth victory in the race; other horse racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Game On Dude led all the way in winning the $500,000 Hollywood Gold Cup by a length, giving the trainer Bob Baffert his fifth victory in the race.

headline.main: Game On Dude Wins Hollywood Gold Cup for Second Time
